greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(n*t^2) - A003145(n), where t = 1.8392867... is the tribonacci constant A058265.
comment: a(n) is in {-1, 0, 1, 2}, but the first n for which -1 appears is n = 329. - _Jeffrey Shallit_, Nov 19 2016
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 28 2016
